metadata.feature_description: Test and validate URL rewriting functionality with detailed results

steps.action: Navigate to Settings > SEO > URL Management > TEST URL tab
steps.expected: Test URL Rewriting interface should be visible
steps.actual: Test URL Rewriting interface is visible with URL to Test field, Test URL Rewriting button, and result fields

steps.action: Enter valid URL 'http://localhost:8081/en-us/Home' and click Test URL Rewriting
steps.expected: URL should be processed and results displayed
steps.actual: URL processed successfully. Rewriting Result: Default.aspx?TabId=21&language=en-US, Identified Page: Home, Identified Language: en-US

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test URL with complex query strings

steps.action: Enter URL with multiple query parameters 'http://localhost:8081/en-us/Our-Products?category=electronics&sort=price&order=asc&page=2'
steps.expected: URL with query strings should be processed correctly
steps.actual: URL processed successfully. Rewriting Result: Default.aspx?TabId=22&language=en-US&category=electronics, Identified Page: Our Products

steps.action: Enter URL with encoded special characters (XSS-like page name) 'http://localhost:8081/en-us/-ltscript-gtalert-39XSS-39-lt-script-gt'
steps.expected: URL with special characters should be processed and properly handled
steps.actual: URL processed successfully. Rewriting Result: Default.aspx?TabId=67&language=en-US, Identified Page shows HTML-encoded script tags, demonstrating proper XSS protection

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test malformed URLs for error handling

steps.expected: System should handle invalid URL gracefully with appropriate error message
steps.actual: System handled gracefully. All result fields show 'None' and Operation Messages displays: 'Invalid URI: The format of the URI could not be determined.'

steps.expected: System should attempt to process URL and show diagnostic information
steps.actual: System processed URL and showed diagnostic info. Identified Page defaulted to Home, Operation Messages showed detailed exception info about 404 handling, which is useful for debugging URL rewriting issues

observations: The Test URL Rewriting feature is only accessible to administrators as the API endpoint uses [DnnAuthorize(StaticRoles = 'Administrators')] attribute
The feature provides comprehensive diagnostic information including rewriting result, identified language/culture, identified page, redirection result, redirection reason, and operation messages
URL rewriting properly handles XSS-like characters by HTML-encoding them in the output
Malformed URLs are handled gracefully with clear error messages rather than system crashes
The feature integrates with DNN's AdvancedUrlRewriter for URL processing
